skills.name: hypothesis-dashboard-pattern
skills.definition: UI dashboard for AI Arena hypothesis validation: List hypotheses with filters, trigger validation debates via modal, poll for progress, show results. Validation flow: Config → Start → Poll → Complete.

skills.name: research-arena-integration
skills.definition: Workflow integration: Research task → 'Validate' button → Create linked hypothesis → AI Arena validation → Update research task status. Bidirectional linking between research and hypotheses.

skills.name: health-service-discovery
skills.definition: Service health monitoring: Service model with health config, async health probing (HTTP/TCP/Redis/PostgreSQL), health status transitions (unknown→up→degraded→down), NATS publishing, federation dashboard.

concepts.name: ValidationModal
concepts.definition: 3-state UI modal: Config (rounds, agents) → Progress (polling with progress bar) → Complete (results, score, recommendation).

concepts.name: Health Check Worker
concepts.definition: Async worker that probes all services, stores health history, uses intelligent scheduling (staggered checks), exponential backoff on failures.

concepts.name: Service Discovery Registry
concepts.definition: Centralized registry for service registration, metadata, capabilities. Enables federation by tracking services across multiple hubs.

relationships.description: Dashboard provides UI for AI Arena debates
Service health feeds into federation health
